english.segment1: Every time I fall down on my face. I see the one who bore all my shame. To know that you are everything I need you to be. You're my ever present help in time of need
english.segment2: I know you understand it all. So why don't I get back on my feet again. Every pain I feel inside my heart. It takes a faith I know I can't depart
english.segment3: To know that you hear every cry I raise to you. Bringing thoughts of hope the words I bring I know are few
english.segment4: I know you understand it all. So why don't I get back on my feet again. You hear me when I call. You're there when I fall. You hear me when I call
english.segment5: I know you understand it all. So why don't I get back on my feet again
